H0.text: Radioactive atoms are atoms with unstable nuclei.

H1.text: Ions are atoms with unstable nuclei.

H2.text: Unstable are atoms with unstable nuclei considered to be.

H3.text: Destructive atoms with unstable nuclei are considered to be.

A4.text: A radionuclide is a nuclide that is unstable and known to undergo radioactive decay into a different nuclide.
